chathurarya sathyaye mul sathyaya wanne dukkha sathyaya ya’ dukkha sathyaya wisthara karana unwahanse dhamma chakka pawaththana suthraye mese wadaramin idankopana bhikkhawe dukkhan ariya sachchan jathipidukkha  wyatipi dukkha aadi washayen deshana karamin penwa dunne minisa melowadi windina duka pamanaya’ nira duka prethaloka ho thirisan apa duk ehi sandahanwa natha’ ewani aathmawaladi windimata siduwana duka minis  lowa pawathina mehi dakwa athi dukata wada ugraya’ eheth unwahanse ee gana pawasa natha’ ebawin sasara dukak gana dakwenne natha’ budun wahanse nodesu sasara duka dharmayata athulath wuye kese dayi daka yuthuya’ samudaya sathyaya: dewana sathyaya dukata hethuwa hewath samudaya sathyayen penwa aththe ya yan thanha ponobhawika aadi washayen nithara athiwana thanhawa misa boho deshakayin pawasana ayuru pera aathmawala yana artha nowe’yanu athiwima misa upatha nowe’ budu dahame punarbhawaya misa punaruthpaththiyak nathi bawa dan apa deshakawarun pawa pawasana bawa pene’

samatha bhawana wada sitha ekanga wu awasthawala molaye tharanga krilayakarithwaya wenaswima matha athinriha ya sanjanana hakiyawa kriayathmakawe.nindedi molaye tharanga krioyakarithwaya wiwidha mattam waladi eeta anurupawa wenas we.me awasthawaladida atham awasthawaladi athinritha ya sanjananaya krieeyathmaka wiyahakiya.yam yam ayata thamata awashyada de nindath nonindath athara parasayehi wu ekthara mattamakadi sanjananaya wiyahaki bawa nirikshanayawi thibe.mebandu pudgalayekuta thamata kiyawimata athi grananthayak kumana pusthakalaye kumana anshaye kumana poth rakkaye athidayi pamanak nowa atham awastha waladi ema grasanthaye warga ankaya thamata awashyaya karanaya athi pitu ankaya pamanak nowa ema pituwe athi eeta adala chedaya pawa dasin dakinnak men manasata aramunu wiya hakiya.sihi wisangnyawa sitina awasthawaladida molaye tharangawala kriyakarithwaya wenas wiya hakiya.ebandu awasthawaladi da athinrio ya sanjananaya kriwayathmaka wiya hakiya.shalya karma aadiyata sidukirimata pera nirwindanaya karanu labuwa da molaya kriwayathmaka we.ebandu awasthawaladi bahira inrira yanhi kriwayakarithwaya itha siyum lesa manasata daniya hakiya.
